categories: Category:Sergeants and lieutenants of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Oarr was a pureblood Sith male who, lacking Force-sensitivity, served as a lieutenant in the Imperial Military. He worked as a vendor on board the Imperial station which orbited Ilum.
Oarr first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic as a security key vendor on the Imperial orbital station above Ilum.
